lead_paragraph: The Olympic Village is ready and organizers are turning in the last three buildings Thursday afternoon, the operations director of the Rio 2016 organizing committee Rodrigo Tostes said.

headline.print_headline: Games Organizers Say Rio's Village Is Ready After Repairs
headline.main: Games Organizers Say Rio's Village Is Ready After Repairs
